skins.shipDescription: Portland-class Heavy Cruiser C Portland, Hull Number CA-33!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Portland, Indy's big sister~! Do it again, properly this time? Aww... If only they'd have called us the Indianapolis-class, rather than the Portland-class... I have 16 battle stars and I've participated in a few big operations too, but who cares about me? Why don't we just talk about my little sister instead?
skins.acquisition: Nice to meet you, Commander. I'm Portland, Indy's big sister. I've participated in the battles of the Coral Sea, Midway, Guadalcanal and Santa Cruz Islands. Hm? Who's Indy? Why, it's a nickname for my dear little sister, Indianapolis!
skins.login: Hey, Commander, please hear me out! My little sister is super cute!
skins.details: Hey, Commander, please hear me out! My little sister is super duper cute!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Come on, Commander, let's head out already. Indy doesn't like people who slack around!
skins.secretaryIdle2: My little sister is just so lovely~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Would you like to see my special Indy mags?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, Commander, please hear me out! Indy's like, sooo soft! Want to touch her together with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Whoa! ... Not even Indy has touched me like that before!

skins.shipDescription: Nice to meet you, I'm Indianaportland! ... Hm? Who's Indy? She's my precious little sister, and my most beloved...
skins.acquisition: Nice to meet you, I'm Indianaportland! ... Hm? Who's Indy? She's my precious little sister, and my most beloved...
skins.details: Commander, did you know? Indy is thiiiiiiis cute!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you're not getting away anymore! Come here, I'm gonna tell you all about my special Indy mags! Today's the day that I'll fully drill Indy's appeal into your head!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I didn't miss any major battles, you say? Well... if I'd have missed any of Indy's cute moments then I'd regret it so much I'd want to cry!
skins.secretaryIdle3: ...! *Gasp* My Indy Cuteness Sensor is going off! Commander, you'll have to excuse me for a bit!

skins.CNClientName: 与印第一起的校园生活
skins.JPClientName: 学@でインディちゃんと！
skins.shipDescription: Commander, look, look! This is my handmade Indy plushie! Isn't it utterly adorable?! It's the magnum opus of my work in the Arts & Crafts Club!
skins.acquisition: Commander, look, look! This is my handmade Indy plushie! Isn't it utterly adorable?! It's the magnum opus of my work in the Arts & Crafts Club!
skins.login: Oh, Commander, have you seen Indy? I want to dress her in some super adorable clothes I made~ Guhehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, why don't we go for lunch? Of course, my dear Indy will be there too!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Whether on the way to school, in class, or heading home, I'm always with Indy... School life is the best thing EVER!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I bet you'd make a good teacher, Commander... So, please, take pictures of Indy from every angle during class! Later, I'll trade you for regular pictures of her!
skins.secretaryTouch: You think Indy's suuuuper cute too, right? She really is! If you want, I'll let you cuddle with my Indy plushie just a bit!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek?! Be careful, Commander! I nearly pricked myself with my needle!
